front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability - Amendment 1: Information Model, YANG Data Model and Management Information Base Module
front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs).
front.abstract: This amendment specifies YANG data models and MIB modules that allow configuration and status reporting for bridges and end systems with the capabilities for Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability (FRER) and stream identification.
